author: gstein
msg: Add the author name for a commit, and run the precommit hook.
log_msg since mod_dav_svn doesn't have it at the time it creates the
txn. (it comes along later, and we apply it directly to the txn props)
svn_repos_fs_begin_txn_for_commit to run the precommit hooks, and to
attach the author name (which comes from repos->username). no log_msg at
